price: Akkuma kana nabiyyii hundaafuu jallattoota irraa diina isaaniif goone, (Karaa irratti) qajeelchuufi [Mu’uminaaf] tumsuu irratti Rabbiin kee ga’aadha.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيٗا وَنَصِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika jaʿalnā likulli nabiyyin ʿaduwwan mina al-muj'rimīna wakafā birabbika hādiyan wanaṣīran
